text: 9|25|Abasya'i allahâ€Œ tomaderake sahayya karechena bahu ksetre ebam hunayanera yud'dhera dine [1] yakhana tomaderake utphulla karechila tomadera sankhyadhikya ha'oya; kintu ta tomadera kono kaje aseni ebam bistrta ha'oya satbe'o yamina tomadera jan'ya sankucita hayechila. Tarapara tomara prstha pradarsana kare paliyechile [2].
